name: Chafonver
culture_notes: tide-and-harvest festivals tied to ritual calendars
diet: preserved fish, seaweeds, salted grains
constraints: Ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
No instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
Long-range mind influence is rare and institutionally banned
notes: serves as small resupply/repair point for nearby isles
tidal harbor with hazardous approaches; pilots valued
small population; roles overlap (officials wear many hats)
